shortDescription: The Beasts of Balawat's armory is just ahead of you, Commander. Strike swiftly, take the facility, and hold it until Megan and Tempest can be extracted. The Kell Hounds and I will handle Rhee and her people. Let's do this.
longDescription: This is going to be risky, but it seems like the only way to be certain that Kell's people make it home safe.

contractObjectiveList.title: Capture the Beasts of Balawat's Armory

objectiveList.title: Scout the Beasts' Armory
objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Beasts of Balawat Forces
objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Occupy the Armory
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

objectiveList.title: Hold Out against the Beasts of Balawat's Attack
objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

objectiveList.title: Pacify the Area Surrounding the Armory
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Hostile Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Armory's Turrets
objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

dialogueContent.words: Okay, {COMMANDER.Callsign}. I've got an assault lance on the ground keeping Rhee and her Beasts occupied. They won't be expecting a backdoor attack on their armory.
Get in there, seize the buildings, and wipe out anyone that tries to stop you. If you do your job right, we should be able to extract Tempest and Megan, and then we've won.
Come and get me, Rhee. Show me what you've learned.
Nicely done, {COMMANDER.LastName}. I just heard from my extraction team—Megan and Tempest are secure.
I'm very happy to hear that, Mr. Kell.
As am I. My assault lance is just mopping up over here. As soon as they're done, we'll meet you in orbit.
Damn it. We bit off more than we could chew, {COMMANDER.LastName}. This is my failure as much as it is yours.
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
DropShip inbound, Commander. Watch your heads.
Hey, Boss? The mercs you're fighting are firing up a bunch of turrets.
Smash 'em down and keep fighting! We don't stop until our people are safe!
I'm seeing heavy defenses around the armory, including point-defense turrets. Not a huge surprise, but it's worth paying attention to.
Keep your head on a swivel, and smash down anything that gets in your way. My scout 'Mechs will follow suit.
